limit_main_charge_up.name: Charge-Up
limit_main_charge_up.description: Must use Primary Action on consecutive turns to charge before using attack.

limit_variant_charge_up_extended_charge.name: Extended Charge
limit_variant_charge_up_extended_charge.description: Must charge for two turns before using.

limit_modifier_extended_charge_triple_ch.name: Triple Charge
limit_modifier_extended_charge_triple_ch.description: Must charge three turns before using.

limit_modifier_extended_charge_cascade_f.name: Cascade Failure
limit_modifier_extended_charge_cascade_f.description: If interrupted during any charge turn, lose ability for rest of combat.

limit_modifier_extended_charge_escalatin.name: Escalating Exposure
limit_modifier_extended_charge_escalatin.description: Each charge turn reduces your Durability by 5.

limit_variant_charge_up_rooted_while_cha.name: Rooted While Charging
limit_variant_charge_up_rooted_while_cha.description: Cannot move between charge-up and release.

limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_imm.name: Immobilized
limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_imm.description: Cannot move until end of turn after releasing attack.

limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_anc.name: Anchored
limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_anc.description: If moved from position by any effect, lose charge.

limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_mel.name: Melee
limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_mel.description: The attack you are making is a melee attack.

limit_variant_charge_up_concentration.name: Concentration
limit_variant_charge_up_concentration.description: Lose charge if you take damage or gain conditions.

limit_modifier_concentration_fragile_con.name: Fragile Concentration
limit_modifier_concentration_fragile_con.description: Concentration breaks if any character moves adjacent to you.

limit_modifier_concentration_cascade_fai.name: Cascade Failure
limit_modifier_concentration_cascade_fai.description: If concentration broken, you cannot attempt any attack with Concentration for rest of combat.

limit_modifier_concentration_proximity_s.name: Proximity Sensitivity
limit_modifier_concentration_proximity_s.description: Concentration breaks if any character moves within 5 spaces of you.

limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_fr.name: Fragile
limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_fr.description: Avoidance becomes 0 while charging, all attacks are critical hits.

limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_be.name: Beacon
limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_be.description: All enemies within 30 spaces know your exact location while charging.

limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_vu.name: Vulnerable
limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_vu.description: Take double damage from all sources while charging.

limit_variant_charge_up_power_lock.name: Power Lock
limit_variant_charge_up_power_lock.description: Disable specific defensive ability while charging, gain points equal to that ability's cost.

limit_modifier_power_lock_extended_lock.name: Extended Lock
limit_modifier_power_lock_extended_lock.description: Disabled ability remains unusable until end of next turn.

limit_modifier_power_lock_multiple_lock.name: Multiple Lock
limit_modifier_power_lock_multiple_lock.description: Disable second defensive ability, gain its cost in points.

limit_modifier_power_lock_system_failure.name: System Failure
limit_modifier_power_lock_system_failure.description: Requires Concentration - If interrupted, all locked abilities unusable for rest of combat.

limit_variant_charge_up_focused_charging.name: Focused Charging
limit_variant_charge_up_focused_charging.description: Must also spend Quick Action on charge and release turns.

limit_modifier_focused_charging_total_fo.name: Total Focus
limit_modifier_focused_charging_total_fo.description: Must spend Primary Action, Quick Action, and Movement on charge turns.

limit_modifier_focused_charging_ally_coo.name: Ally Coordination
limit_modifier_focused_charging_ally_coo.description: Adjacent ally must attack same target you're charging against or charge fails.

limit_modifier_focused_charging_reaction.name: Reaction Delay
limit_modifier_focused_charging_reaction.description: Cannot use Reactions while charging, gain points equal to cost of reaction abilities you have purchased.

limit_main_reserves.name: Reserves
limit_main_reserves.description: Can only be used 3 times per combat. Regain all uses after combat ends.

limit_modifier_reserves_2_extended_recov.name: Extended Recovery
limit_modifier_reserves_2_extended_recov.description: Regain uses after full rest instead of after combat, once per day.

limit_variant_reserves_volatile_uses.name: Volatile Uses
limit_variant_reserves_volatile_uses.description: Each time you take damage, lose 1 use.

limit_modifier_volatile_uses_condition_t.name: Condition Trigger
limit_modifier_volatile_uses_condition_t.description: Each time you gain a condition, lose 1 use.

limit_modifier_volatile_uses_critical_fa.name: Critical Failure
limit_modifier_volatile_uses_critical_fa.description: If you roll a natural 1 on any d20, lose 1 use.

limit_modifier_volatile_uses_life_drain.name: Life Drain
limit_modifier_volatile_uses_life_drain.description: If out of uses, and you would lose 1, take 15 damage instead.

limit_variant_reserves_shared_pool.name: Shared Pool
limit_variant_reserves_shared_pool.description: Multiple special attacks share same use pool, total uses divided among them, +1 use to the pool for each special attack added.

limit_modifier_shared_pool_pool_drain.name: Pool Drain
limit_modifier_shared_pool_pool_drain.description: If any attack in pool misses, remove an extra use.

limit_modifier_shared_pool_cascade_lock.name: Cascade Lock
limit_modifier_shared_pool_cascade_lock.description: If any attack in pool misses, no attacks in pool can be used for 1 turn.

limit_variant_reserves_steady.name: Steady
limit_variant_reserves_steady.description: Cannot use until turn 3 of combat.

limit_modifier_steady_patient.name: Patient
limit_modifier_steady_patient.description: Cannot use until turn 5 of combat.

limit_modifier_steady_unhealthy.name: Unhealthy
limit_modifier_steady_unhealthy.description: Must be below half HP to use.

limit_modifier_steady_timid.name: Timid
limit_modifier_steady_timid.description: Cannot use unless you are at full hit points and are not affected by any conditions.

limit_main_cooldown.name: Cooldown
limit_main_cooldown.description: Cannot use again for 1 turn after use.

limit_variant_cooldown_cooldown_2.name: Cooldown 2
limit_variant_cooldown_cooldown_2.description: Cannot use again for 2 turns after use.

limit_modifier_cooldown_2_cooldown_3.name: Cooldown 3
limit_modifier_cooldown_2_cooldown_3.description: Cannot use again for 3 turns after use.

limit_modifier_cooldown_2_permanent_inju.name: Permanent Injury
limit_modifier_cooldown_2_permanent_inju.description: Each use of this limit, permanantly increases all cooldown cooldown periods by 1 turn, until you take a full rest.

limit_modifier_cooldown_2_fates.name: Fates
limit_modifier_cooldown_2_fates.description: Roll a d4-1 when the attack is made, the cooldown is extended by the result.

limit_variant_cooldown_failure_extension.name: Failure Extension
limit_variant_cooldown_failure_extension.description: If attack misses or fails effect, cooldown period increases by 1 turn.

limit_modifier_failure_extension_doublin.name: Doubling Failure
limit_modifier_failure_extension_doublin.description: If attack misses or fails effect, cooldown period increases by 1 turn.

limit_variant_cooldown_shared_cooldown.name: Shared Cooldown
limit_variant_cooldown_shared_cooldown.description: Choose 2 other of your special attacks, they can't be used while you are cooling down from this attack.

limit_modifier_shared_cooldown_increased.name: Increased Cooldown
limit_modifier_shared_cooldown_increased.description: Choose 1 of your more special attacks, they can't be used while you are cooling down from this attack.

limit_modifier_shared_cooldown_mass_cool.name: Mass Cooldown
limit_modifier_shared_cooldown_mass_cool.description: All of your special attacks cannot be used while you are cooling down from this attack.

limit_variant_cooldown_death_proximity.name: Death Proximity
limit_variant_cooldown_death_proximity.description: Cooldown increases by 1 turn for every 25 HP below maximum.

limit_modifier_death_proximity_trigger_e.name: Trigger Extension
limit_modifier_death_proximity_trigger_e.description: Taking damage or gaining conditions adds 1 turn to current cooldown.

limit_modifier_death_proximity_condition.name: Condition Spiral
limit_modifier_death_proximity_condition.description: Conditions aquired last until the end of your cooldown period.

limit_variant_cooldown_healthy.name: Healthy
limit_variant_cooldown_healthy.description: Your cooldowns don't go down unless you are above 50 HP and not affected by any advanced conditions.

limit_modifier_healthy_pinnacle_of_healt.name: Pinnacle of Health
limit_modifier_healthy_pinnacle_of_healt.description: Your cooldowns don't go down unless you are at max HP and not affected by any conditions.

limit_modifier_healthy_timid.name: Timid
limit_modifier_healthy_timid.description: You cannot use this attack unless you are at max HP and not affected by any conditions.

limit_main_unreliable.name: Unreliable
limit_main_unreliable.description: Roll d20 before use; if under 5, attack fails and action is wasted.

limit_modifier_unreliable_10_double_chec.name: Double Check
limit_modifier_unreliable_10_double_chec.description: Must make reliability check twice, both must succeed.

limit_variant_unreliable_stress_breakdow.name: Stress Breakdown
limit_variant_unreliable_stress_breakdow.description: Reliability DC increases by 1 each turn of combat.

limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_rapid_de.name: Rapid Degradation
limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_rapid_de.description: Reliability DC increases by an additional 1 each turn of combat.

limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_health_d.name: Health Dependent
limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_health_d.description: DC increases by 1 for every 10 HP missing.

limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_fearful.name: Fearful
limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_fearful.description: DC increases by 5 if an enemy is adjacent to you.

limit_variant_unreliable_equipment_depen.name: Equipment Dependent
limit_variant_unreliable_equipment_depen.description: You have a specific, noticeable and disarmable item, in order to do any attack. There needs to be a reason, you wouldn't always have this item on you. (discuss with GM)

limit_modifier_equipment_dependent_fragi.name: Fragile Gear
limit_modifier_equipment_dependent_fragi.description: If you fail the Unreliable roll, the item breaks and won't be fixed until you spend 8 hours, or meet another specified condition (discuss with GM).

limit_modifier_equipment_dependent_maint.name: Maintenance
limit_modifier_equipment_dependent_maint.description: Equipment breaks if attack fails, requires action to repair.

limit_variant_unreliable_cascading_failu.name: Cascading Failure
limit_variant_unreliable_cascading_failu.description: Each failure increases next reliability DC by 5.

limit_modifier_cascading_failure_spread_.name: Spread Effect
limit_modifier_cascading_failure_spread_.description: Failed checks increase DC for all your special attacks.

limit_modifier_cascading_failure_critica.name: Critical Cascade
limit_modifier_cascading_failure_critica.description: Failures in combat make ability unusable for rest of session.

limit_variant_unreliable_attrition.name: Attrition
limit_variant_unreliable_attrition.description: When unreliable roll fails, take 15 damage.

limit_modifier_attrition_attrition_2.name: Attrition 2
limit_modifier_attrition_attrition_2.description: When unreliable roll fails, take an additional 15 damage.

limit_modifier_attrition_concussive_kick.name: Concussive Kickback
limit_modifier_attrition_concussive_kick.description: When unreliable roll fails, gain Stun condition, until the start of your next turn.

limit_modifier_attrition_exhaustive.name: Exhaustive
limit_modifier_attrition_exhaustive.description: When unreliable roll fails, you must spend an effort or fall unconscious.

limit_main_combo_move.name: Combo Move
limit_main_combo_move.description: You must have hit an enemy on your last turn.

limit_variant_combo_move_revenge.name: Revenge
limit_variant_combo_move_revenge.description: You must have done damage or inflicted a condition on your last turn.

limit_modifier_revenge_kill_history.name: Kill History
limit_modifier_revenge_kill_history.description: You must have defeated an enemy on your last turn.

limit_modifier_revenge_perfect_opening.name: Perfect Opening
limit_modifier_revenge_perfect_opening.description: You must have critically hit on your last turn.

limit_modifier_revenge_follow_up.name: Follow-Up
limit_modifier_revenge_follow_up.description: You must hit the same enemy as you did last turn.

limit_variant_combo_move_switch_hitter.name: Switch Hitter
limit_variant_combo_move_switch_hitter.description: Can only target enemies you have not damaged this combat.

limit_modifier_switch_hitter_first_blood.name: First Blood
limit_modifier_switch_hitter_first_blood.description: Can only target enemies no ally has damaged this combat.

limit_modifier_switch_hitter_finishing_m.name: Finishing Move
limit_modifier_switch_hitter_finishing_m.description: Can only target enemies below half max HP.

limit_variant_combo_move_ally_setup.name: Ally Setup
limit_variant_combo_move_ally_setup.description: Ally must have hit the same enemy you're about to attack this turn.

limit_modifier_ally_setup_coordination.name: Coordination
limit_modifier_ally_setup_coordination.description: Ally attack must have damaged or inflicted a condition on the same enemy you're about to attack this turn.

limit_modifier_ally_setup_perfect_teamwo.name: Perfect Teamwork
limit_modifier_ally_setup_perfect_teamwo.description: Must be a specific Ally, chosen when limit taken.

limit_variant_combo_move_steady.name: Steady
limit_variant_combo_move_steady.description: Cannot use until turn 3 of combat.

limit_modifier_steady_patient_combo.name: Patient
limit_modifier_steady_patient_combo.description: Cannot use until turn 5 of combat.

limit_variant_combo_move_escalation.name: Escalation
limit_variant_combo_move_escalation.description: Cannot use until an ally is below half HP.

limit_modifier_escalation_desperation.name: Desperation
limit_modifier_escalation_desperation.description: Cannot use until ally is unconscious.

limit_variant_combo_move_set_up.name: Set Up
limit_variant_combo_move_set_up.description: Must have hit with a specific special attack (chosen when limit taken).

limit_modifier_set_up_solid_set_up.name: Solid Set Up
limit_modifier_set_up_solid_set_up.description: Must have damaged or inflicted a condition with a specific special attack (chosen when limit taken).

limit_modifier_set_up_perfect_opening_co.name: Perfect Opening
limit_modifier_set_up_perfect_opening_co.description: Must have critically hit with specific special attack.

limit_main_unhealthy.name: Unhealthy
limit_main_unhealthy.description: Can only use when below max HP.

limit_variant_unhealthy_unhealthy_2.name: Unhealthy 2
limit_variant_unhealthy_unhealthy_2.description: Can only use when at 75 HP or below.

limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_3.name: Unhealthy 3
limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_3.description: Can only use when at 50 HP or below.

limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_4.name: Unhealthy 4
limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_4.description: Can only use when at 25 HP or below.

limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_5.name: Unhealthy 5
limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_5.description: Can only use when at 0 HP or below.

limit_variant_unhealthy_fresh_wound_1.name: Fresh Wound 1
limit_variant_unhealthy_fresh_wound_1.description: Must have taken 15+ damage since the end of your last turn to use.

limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_fresh_wound.name: Fresh Wound 2
limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_fresh_wound.description: Must have taken 30+ damage since the end of your last turn to use.

limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_continuous_.name: Continuous Suffering
limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_continuous_.description: Must have taken damage on every turn for the last 3 turns, cannot be caused by Attrition.

limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_condition_l.name: Condition Lock
limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_condition_l.description: Must be afflicted by a condition.

limit_variant_unhealthy_attrition_1.name: Attrition 1
limit_variant_unhealthy_attrition_1.description: Each use costs 15 HP, paid after attack resolves.

limit_modifier_attrition_1_attrition_x.name: Attrition X
limit_modifier_attrition_1_attrition_x.description: Each successive use costs additional 15 HP (15, 30, 45, etc.)

limit_modifier_attrition_1_concussed.name: Concussed
limit_modifier_attrition_1_concussed.description: You become stunned until the end of your next turn.

limit_variant_unhealthy_desperation.name: Desperation
limit_variant_unhealthy_desperation.description: Can only use when an ally is at 25 HP or below.

limit_modifier_desperation_last_resort.name: Last Resort
limit_modifier_desperation_last_resort.description: Can only use when 2+ allies are at 25 HP or below.

limit_modifier_desperation_avenger.name: Avenger
limit_modifier_desperation_avenger.description: Can when an ally is unconscious.
